TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFile extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFile abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供建立、解壓縮及開啟 zip 封存的靜態方法。

span.span: Provides static methods for creating, extracting, and opening zip archives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要使用類別，您必須加入參考`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件，在您的專案中; 否則您會得到下列錯誤訊息時嘗試編譯： **'ZipFile' 不存在於目前的內容名稱**.To use the class, you must add a reference to the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project; otherwise, you'll get the following error message when trying to compile : **The name 'ZipFile' does not exist in the current context**. 如需有關如何將參考加入專案加入 Visual Studio 中的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 加入或移除參考使用參考管理員](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1aabb520-99b0-46c6-9368-21b4d84793eb)。For more information on how to add a reference to your project in Visual Studio, see [How to: Add or Remove References By Using the Reference Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1aabb520-99b0-46c6-9368-21b4d84793eb). 管理的 zip 封存和其檔案的方法分散到三個類別： ，和。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their files are spread across three classes: , and . |若要...To…|請使用於…Use…| |---------|----------| |建立 zip 封存的目錄Create a zip archive from a directory|| |擷取目錄的 zip 封存的內容Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |將新檔案加入至現有的 zip 封存Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |擷取 zip 封存中的檔案Retrieve an file in a zip archive|| |擷取所有 zip 封存中的檔案Retrieve all of the files in a zip archive|| |若要開啟的資料流的個別檔案所包含之 zip 封存中To open a stream to an individual file contained in a zip archive|| |從 zip 封存中刪除檔案Delete a file from a zip archive|| 您無法使用或中的類別[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。You cannot use the or classes in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式，您應使用下列類別使用的壓縮檔案。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you should use the following classes to work with compressed files. - - - - ## Examples 這個範例示範如何建立和使用解壓縮 zip 封存類別。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它會壓縮成 zip 封存，資料夾的內容，並再擷取該內容發佈至新的資料夾。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. > [!TIP] > 若要使用 類別，您必須參考專案中的 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 組件。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立包含指定目錄中檔案及目錄的 zip 封存。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CreateFromDirectory (string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName);
.method public static hidebysig void CreateFromDirectory(string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub CreateFromDirectory (sourceDirectoryName As String, destinationArchiveFileName As String)
public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName);

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 要封存的目錄路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要建立之封存的路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 建立包含指定目錄中檔案及目錄的 zip 封存。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從檔案系統的目錄結構會保留在封存中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果目錄是空的則會建立空的封存。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 這個方法多載不包含在封存中的基底目錄並不允許您指定的壓縮層級。This method overload does not include the base directory in the archive and does not allow you to specify a compression level. 如果您想要包含的基底目錄，或指定的壓縮層級，請呼叫方法多載。If you want to include the base directory or specify a compression level, call the method overload. 如果封存已存在，擲回例外狀況。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果封存中已經存在具有指定名稱的項目，第二個項目會建立具有相同的名稱。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果目錄中的檔案無法加入到封存，在封存處於不完整、 不正確，而且方法會擲回例外狀況。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何建立和使用解壓縮 zip 封存類別。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它會壓縮成 zip 封存，資料夾的內容，並再擷取該內容發佈至新的資料夾。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. 若要使用 類別，您必須參考專案中的 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 組件。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 或 為 ，只含有空白字元，或者含有至少一個無效字元。

span.span: or is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.

exception.span: 或 為 。

exception.span: 在 或 中，指定的路徑、檔案名稱或兩者都超過系統定義的最大長度。

span.span: In or , the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在 Windows 平台上，路徑不得超過 248 個字元，檔案名稱則不得超過 260 個字元。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 無效或不存在 (例如，位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

span.span: is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 已存在。

span.span: already exists.
-or-

exception.span: 無法開啟指定之目錄中的檔案。

span.span: A file in the specified directory could not be opened.

exception.span: 會指定目錄。

span.span: specifies a directory.
-or-

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限，無法存取 中指定的目錄或 中指定的檔案。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the directory specified in or the file specified in .

exception.span: 或 包含無效的格式。

span.span: or contains an invalid format.
-or-

exception.span: Zip 封存不支援寫入。

span.span: The zip archive does not support writing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CreateFromDirectory (string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory);

.method public static hidebysig void CreateFromDirectory(string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory) cil managed

public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory);

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 要封存的目錄路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要建立之封存的路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指出建立項目時是否要強調速度或壓縮的效益。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

param.name: includeBaseDirectory
param.span: 表示從 sourceDirectoryName (位於封存根目錄中) 包含目錄名稱， 表示只包含目錄的內容。

span.span: to include the directory name from sourceDirectoryName at the root of the archive; to include only the contents of the directory.

summary.span: 建立 zip 封存，這個封存包含指定之目錄中的檔案及目錄，使用指定的壓縮等級，並選擇性包含基底目錄。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level, and optionally includes the base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從檔案系統的目錄結構會保留在封存中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果目錄是空的則會建立空的封存。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 您可以使用這個方法多載，指定的壓縮層級，以及是否要包含在封存中的基底目錄。Use this method overload to specify the compression level and whether to include the base directory in the archive. 如果封存已存在，擲回例外狀況。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果封存中已經存在具有指定名稱的項目，第二個項目會建立具有相同的名稱。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果目錄中的檔案無法加入到封存，在封存處於不完整、 不正確，而且方法會擲回例外狀況。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何建立和使用解壓縮 zip 封存類別。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它會壓縮成 zip 封存，資料夾的內容，並再擷取該內容發佈至新的資料夾。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. 壓縮的封存，基底目錄都會包括在內，壓縮層級設定為透過效率強調作業速度。When compressing the archive, the base directory is included and the compression level is set to emphasize the speed of the operation over efficiency. 若要使用 類別，您必須參考專案中的 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 組件。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CreateFromDirectory (string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);

.method public static hidebysig void CreateFromDirectory(string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed

public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 要封存的目錄路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要建立之封存的路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指出建立項目時是否要強調速度或壓縮的效益。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

param.name: includeBaseDirectory
param.span: 表示從 sourceDirectoryName (位於封存根目錄中) 包含目錄名稱， 表示只包含目錄的內容。

span.span: to include the directory name from sourceDirectoryName at the root of the archive; to include only the contents of the directory.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在此封存中讀取或寫入項目名稱時要使用的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 只有需要編碼以與 Zip 封存工具和程式庫互通，且這類工具和程式庫不支援項目名稱使用 UTF-8 編碼時，才指定此參數的值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 建立 zip 封存，這個封存包含指定之目錄中的檔案及目錄，針對項目名稱使用指定的壓縮等級和字元編碼方式，並選擇性包含基底目錄。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level and character encoding for entry names, and optionally includes the base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從檔案系統的目錄結構會保留在封存中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果目錄是空的則會建立空的封存。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 使用這個方法多載指定壓縮層級和字元編碼，以及是否要包含在封存中的基底目錄。Use this method overload to specify the compression level and character encoding, and whether to include the base directory in the archive. 如果封存已存在，擲回例外狀況。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果封存中已經存在具有指定名稱的項目，第二個項目會建立具有相同的名稱。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果目錄中的檔案無法加入到封存，在封存處於不完整、 不正確，而且方法會擲回例外狀況。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. 如果`entryNameEncoding`以外設定為值`null`，使用指定的編碼方式來進行編碼的項目名稱。If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the entry names are encoded by using the specified encoding. 如果指定的編碼方式為 utf-8，為每個項目，設定的語言編碼 （以本機檔案標頭的一般用途的位元旗標） 旗標If the specified encoding is a UTF-8, the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set for each entry, 如果`entryNameEncoding`設`null`，項目名稱會編碼根據下列規則：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, the entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 包含字元的 ASCII 範圍之外的項目名稱，設定語言編碼旗標，以及 utf-8 來編碼項目名稱。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and UTF-8 is used to encode the entry name. - 只能包含 ASCII 字元項目名稱，設定語言編碼旗標，以及目前的系統預設字碼頁用來編碼項目名稱。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is set, and the current system default code page is used to encode the entry names.

span.span: or is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
-or-

exception.span: 會設定為 UTF-8 以外的 Unicode 編碼方式。

span.span: is set to a Unicode encoding other than UTF-8.

exception.span: 或 為 。

span.span: or is .

span.span: In or , the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在 Windows 平台上，路徑不得超過 248 個字元，檔案名稱則不得超過 260 個字元。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 無效或不存在 (例如，位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

span.span: is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 已存在。

span.span: already exists.
-or-

exception.span: 無法開啟指定之目錄中的檔案。

span.span: A file in the specified directory could not be opened.

exception.span: 會指定目錄。

span.span: specifies a directory.
-or-

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限，無法存取 中指定的目錄或 中指定的檔案。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the directory specified in or the file specified in .

exception.span: 或 包含無效的格式。

span.span: or contains an invalid format.
-or-

summary.span: 將指定之 zip 封存中的所有檔案解壓縮到檔案系統上的目錄。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName);

param.name: sourceArchiveFileName
param.span: 要擷取之封存的路徑。

span.span: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 要在其中放置解壓縮檔案的目錄路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 將指定之 zip 封存中的所有檔案解壓縮到檔案系統上的目錄。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立指定的目錄和所有子目錄。This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories. 目的地目錄不存在。The destination directory cannot already exist. 驗證中的路徑與相關的例外狀況`destinationDirectoryName`或`sourceArchiveFileName`參數擷取之前就會擲回。Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction. 否則，如果在擷取期間發生錯誤，封存會維持部分擷取。Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每個已解壓縮的檔案具有相同的相對路徑，以指定的目錄`destinationDirectoryName`作為其來源項目都有封存的根目錄。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何建立和使用解壓縮 zip 封存類別。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它會壓縮成 zip 封存的資料夾的內容，並擷取該內容發佈至新的資料夾。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive and extracts that content to a new folder. 若要使用 類別，您必須參考專案中的 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 組件。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 或 為 ，只含有空白字元，或者含有至少一個無效字元。

span.span: or is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.

exception.span: 或 為 。

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 或 中指定的路徑超過系統定義的最大長度。

span.span: The specified path in or exceeds the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在 Windows 平台上，路徑不得超過 248 個字元，檔案名稱則不得超過 260 個字元。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 所指定的目錄已經存在。

span.span: The directory specified by already exists.
-or-

exception.span: 封存中的項目名稱是 、只包含空白字元，或包含至少一個無效字元。

span.span: The name of an entry in the archive is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
-or-

exception.span: 解壓縮封存項目會建立 所指定目錄外的檔案。

span.span: Extracting an archive entry would create a file that is outside the directory specified by .

exception.span: (例如，如果項目名稱包含上層目錄存取子，則可能發生這種情況)。

span.span: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.)
-or-

exception.span: 要解壓縮的封存項目與已經從相同封存解壓縮的項目具有相同的名稱。

span.span: An archive entry to extract has the same name as an entry that has already been extracted from the same archive.

exception.span: 呼叫端不具有存取封存或目的地目錄的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the archive or the destination directory.

exception.span: 或 包含無效的格式。

span.span: or contains an invalid format.

exception.span: 找不到 。

span.span: was not found.

exception.span: 由 指定的封存不是有效的 zip 封存。

span.span: The archive specified by is not a valid zip archive.
-or-

exception.span: 找不到封存項目，或是其已損毀。

span.span: An archive entry was not found or was corrupt.
-or-

exception.span: 封存項目是使用不支援的壓縮方法進行壓縮。

span.span: An archive entry was compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String, overwriteFiles As Boolean)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles);
public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String, entryNameEncoding As Encoding)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);

param.name: sourceArchiveFileName
param.span: 要擷取之封存的路徑。

span.span: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 要在其中放置解壓縮檔案的目錄路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在此封存中讀取或寫入項目名稱時要使用的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 只有需要編碼以與 Zip 封存工具和程式庫互通，且這類工具和程式庫不支援項目名稱使用 UTF-8 編碼時，才指定此參數的值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 將指定之 zip 封存中的所有檔案解壓縮到檔案系統上的目錄，並對項目名稱使用指定的字元編碼方式。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system and uses the specified character encoding for entry names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立指定的目錄和所有子目錄。This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories. 目的地目錄不存在。The destination directory cannot already exist. 驗證中的路徑與相關的例外狀況`destinationDirectoryName`或`sourceArchiveFileName`參數擷取之前就會擲回。Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction. 否則，如果在擷取期間發生錯誤，封存會維持部分擷取。Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每個已解壓縮的檔案具有相同的相對路徑，以指定的目錄`destinationDirectoryName`作為其來源項目都有封存的根目錄。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. 如果`entryNameEncoding`以外設定為值`null`，項目名稱解碼根據下列規則：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 未設定的語言編碼 （以本機檔案標頭的一般用途的位元旗標） 旗標其中的項目名稱，使用指定的編碼方式解碼項目名稱。For entry names where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the entry names are decoded by using the specified encoding. - 設有語言編碼旗標的項目，項目名稱會使用 utf-8 解碼。For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8. 如果`entryNameEncoding`設`null`，項目名稱解碼根據下列規則：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 未設定的語言編碼旗標 （以本機檔案標頭的一般用途的位元旗標） 位置的項目，項目名稱會使用目前的系統預設字碼頁來解碼。For entries where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, entry names are decoded by using the current system default code page. - 設有語言編碼旗標的項目，項目名稱會使用 utf-8 解碼。For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding, bool overwriteFiles);

Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String, entryNameEncoding As Encoding, overwriteFiles As Boolean)

summary.span: 在指定路徑上以指定的模式開啟 zip 封存。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path and in the specified mode.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open (string archiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open(string archiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode) cil managed
Public Shared Function Open (archiveFileName As String, mode As ZipArchiveMode) As ZipArchive
public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ Open(System::String ^ archiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveMode mode);

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要開啟之封存的路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定在開啟的封存檔中項目上所允許的動作。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions which are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.

summary.span: 在指定路徑上以指定的模式開啟 zip 封存。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path and in the specified mode.

returns.span: 已開啟的 zip 封存。

span.span: The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將`mode`參數，封存會以開啟從列舉型別做為檔案模式的值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with from the enumeration as the file mode value. 如果封存不存在，擲回例外狀況。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. 設定`mode`參數就相當於呼叫方法。Setting the `mode` parameter to is equivalent to calling the method. 當您將`mode`參數，封存會以開啟做為檔案模式的值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果封存已存在，就會擲回。If the archive already exists, an is thrown. 當您將`mode`參數，封存會以開啟做為檔案模式的值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果封存已存在，會將它開啟。If the archive exists, it is opened. 您可以修改現有的項目，且無法建立新的項目。The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created. 如果封存不存在，會建立新的封存。不過，建立 zip 封存中的模式不是建立在效率模式。If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in mode is not as efficient as creating it in mode. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何開啟 zip 封存處於更新模式，並將項目新增至封存。The following example shows how to open a zip archive in the update mode and add an entry to the archive. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open (string archiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open(string archiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed
Public Shared Function Open (archiveFileName As String, mode As ZipArchiveMode, entryNameEncoding As Encoding) As ZipArchive
public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ Open(System::String ^ archiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveMode mode, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要開啟之封存的路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定在開啟的封存檔中項目上所允許的動作。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions that are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在此封存中讀取或寫入項目名稱時要使用的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 只有需要編碼以與 Zip 封存工具和程式庫互通，且這類工具和程式庫不支援項目名稱使用 UTF-8 編碼時，才指定此參數的值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 使用指定的模式，並將指定的字元編碼方式使用於項目名稱，即可開啟位於指定路徑的 zip 封存。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path, in the specified mode, and by using the specified character encoding for entry names.

returns.span: 已開啟的 zip 封存。

span.span: The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將`mode`參數，封存會以開啟做為檔案模式的值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果封存不存在，擲回例外狀況。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. 設定`mode`參數就相當於呼叫方法。Setting the `mode` parameter to is equivalent to calling the method. 當您將`mode`參數，封存會以開啟做為檔案模式的值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果封存已存在，就會擲回。If the archive already exists, an is thrown. 當您將`mode`參數，封存會以開啟做為檔案模式的值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果封存已存在，會將它開啟。If the archive exists, it is opened. 您可以修改現有的項目，且無法建立新的項目。The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created. 如果封存不存在，會建立新的封存。不過，建立 zip 封存中的模式不是建立在效率模式。If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in mode is not as efficient as creating it in mode. 當您開啟 zip 封存檔案進行讀取和`entryNameEncoding`設`null`，項目名稱解碼根據下列規則：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 當未設定的語言編碼 （以本機檔案標頭的一般用途的位元旗標） 旗標時，目前的系統預設字碼頁用來解碼的項目名稱。When the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the current system default code page is used to decode the entry name. - 當設定的語言編碼旗標時，utf-8 用來解碼項目名稱。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 當您開啟 zip 封存檔案進行讀取和`entryNameEncoding`以外設定為值`null`，項目名稱解碼根據下列規則：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 當語言編碼旗標未設定，指定`entryNameEncoding`用來解碼的項目名稱。When the language encoding flag is not set, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to decode the entry name. - 當設定的語言編碼旗標時，utf-8 用來解碼項目名稱。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 當您撰寫封存檔案和`entryNameEncoding`設`null`，項目名稱會編碼根據下列規則：When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 包含 ASCII 範圍以外的字元的項目名稱、 語言編碼旗標已設定，而且項目名稱會使用 utf-8 編碼。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and entry names are encoded by using UTF-8. - 用於項目只能包含 ASCII 字元的名稱，未設定的語言編碼旗標，並使用目前的系統預設字碼頁來進行編碼的項目名稱。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is not set, and entry names are encoded by using the current system default code page. 當您撰寫封存檔案和`entryNameEncoding`以外設定為值`null`，指定`entryNameEncoding`用來編碼為位元組的項目名稱。When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to encode the entry names into bytes. 只有當指定的編碼方式為 utf-8 編碼時設定的語言編碼旗標 （以本機檔案標頭的一般用途的位元旗標）。The language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set only when the specified encoding is a UTF-8 encoding.

exception.span: 是 、只包含空白字元，或包含至少一個無效字元。

span.span: is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
-or-

exception.span: 會設定為 UTF-8 以外的 Unicode 編碼方式。

span.span: is set to a Unicode encoding other than UTF-8.

exception.span: 為 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 在 中，指定的路徑、檔案名稱或兩者都超過系統定義的最大長度。

span.span: In , the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在 Windows 平台上，路徑不得超過 248 個字元，檔案名稱則不得超過 260 個字元。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 無效或不存在 (例如，位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

span.span: is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 無法開啟 。

span.span: could not be opened.
-or-

exception.span: 設定為 ，而且 中指定的檔案已經存在。

span.span: is set to , but the file specified in already exists.

exception.span: 會指定目錄。

span.span: specifies a directory.
-or-

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有所需的使用權限來存取 中所指定的檔案。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the file specified in .

exception.span: 指定了無效的值。

span.span: specifies an invalid value.

exception.span: 設定為 ，而且找不到 中指定的檔案。

span.span: is set to , but the file specified in is not found.

exception.span: 包含無效的格式。

span.span: contains an invalid format.

exception.span: 無法解譯為 zip 封存。

span.span: could not be interpreted as a zip archive.
-or-

exception.span: 是 ，但是項目從封存中遺失，或已損毀且無法讀取。

span.span: is , but an entry is missing or corrupt and cannot be read.
-or-

exception.span: 是 ，但是項目太大，無法放入記憶體。

span.span: is , but an entry is too large to fit into memory.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive OpenRead (string archiveFileName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive OpenRead(string archiveFileName) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenRead (archiveFileName As String) As ZipArchive
public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ OpenRead(System::String ^ archiveFileName);

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要開啟之封存的路徑 (指定為相對或絕對路徑)。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 開啟位於指定路徑的 zip 封存以讀取。

span.span: Opens a zip archive for reading at the specified path.

returns.span: 已開啟的 zip 封存。

span.span: The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於呼叫方法，並設定`mode`參數。This method is equivalent to calling the method and setting the `mode` parameter to . 封存使用開啟做為檔案模式的值。The archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果封存不存在，擲回例外狀況。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何開啟 zip 封存以讀取。The following example shows how to open a zip archive for reading. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]
